fields.description:
Description:
While testing ButtonBar I noticed that it animates every time  buttons "Next" or "Previous" pressed. 
This is not a regression, occurs in 2.1.0

Steps to reproduce:
1. Install the attachment
2. Run TIMOB-6463
3. Press on a first text field
4. Press "Next"or "Previous"button 

Actual result:
ButtonBar always animates after pressing buttons

Expected result:
NO animation
fields.summary: iOS: ButtonBar - ButtonBar on a keyboard animates every time  buttons "Next" or  "Previous" pressed
